Headline: #20 Madison, #J14 Jeffrey Jump and #56 Milwaukee Temporary Westbound Reroute near Madison/Clark
ShortDescription: WB 20 Madison, J14 Jeffrey Jump & 56 Milwaukee buses are rerouted via Madison, Clark, Adams, Franklin & Madison, due to street blockage on Madison/Clark.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
How does this affect my trip?

Westbound #20 Madison, #J14 Jeffrey Jump and #56 Milwaukee buses are temporarily rerouted via Madison, Clark, Adams, Franklin, Madison, then resume their normal route, due to street blockage on Madison/Clark.

Eastbound buses are not affected.

Allow extra travel time.

Headline: #60 Blue Island/26th and #124 Navy Pier Temporary Westbound Reroute near Madison/Clark
ShortDescription: WB 60 Blue Island/26th and 124 Navy Pier buses are rerouted via Madison, Clark, Adams, Franklin, Madison, & over normal route, due to blockage on Madison/Clark.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
How does this affect my trip?

Westbound #60 Blue Island/26th and #124 Navy Pier buses are temporarily rerouted via Madison, Clark, Adams, Franklin, Madison, then resume their normal route, due to street blockage on Madison/Clark.

Eastbound buses are not affected.

Allow extra travel time.

Headline: #70 Division Temporary Reroute at Division/Lawndale
ShortDescription: 70 Division buses are temporarily rerouted via Division, Grand, Hamlin & Division, due to police activity near Division/Lawndale.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
#70 Division buses are temporarily rerouted in both directions via Division, Grand, Hamlin, then resume their normal route on Division, due to police activity near Division/Lawndale.

Allow extra travel time.

Headline: 95th-bound Red Line Delays
ShortDescription: 95th-bound Red Line trains are running w/residual delays following an earlier mechanical problem at Roosevelt. Service is resuming, allow extra time.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
95th-bound Red Line trains are running with residual delays following an earlier mechanical problem at Roosevelt. 

Trains are moving and normal service is being restored.

Allow extra travel time.
